area = "gemmine2";
areaname = "Gem Mine";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "GemMine";
A_sprites = [{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:13,y:40,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"INTERJECTION",model:"_trigger",x:18,y:43,ExecuteScript:function()
{
   _root.Interjection("Deugan","deugan_minehelp","c_A_Deugan");
}},{name:"N",model:"area_transition",x:29,y:1,dest:["gemmine3",3,28]},{name:"S",model:"area_transition",x:18,y:48,dest:["gemmine",7,2],ARROW:"S"}];
if(GameData.plotVars.BRIEFING < 3 && !GameData.plotVars.GemMinesBandits1)
{
   A_sprites = A_sprites.concat([{name:"Grateful Miner",model:"miner",x:9,y:7,walkspeed:-1,dir:"e",elem:"EARTH",conv:[["grin","Thanks for saving us there! We owe yer one!"]]},{name:"Happy Miner",model:"miner",x:8,y:6,walkspeed:-1,dir:"e",elem:"EARTH",conv:[["grin","Yay! I\'m a miner!"]]},{name:"Sceptical Miner",model:"miner",x:8,y:8,walkspeed:-1,dir:"e",elem:"EARTH",conv:[["blah","I hate these bandits... They came here and forced us to mine gems for them, because their Chief is looking for the Legendary Crystals! Hah! He might as well try looking for YALORT, or Father Pigglemas! They\'re just stories!"]]},{name:"Bandit",model:"bandit",x:11,y:7,walkspeed:-1,dir:"w",elem:"EARTH",conv:"c_mines"},{name:"Gope",model:"bandit",x:12,y:6,walkspeed:-1,dir:"w",elem:"EARTH",conv:[["shok","If you\'re talking to me, report this to Pseudolonewolf! It shouldn\'t happen!"]]},{name:"INTERJECTION",model:"_trigger",x:14,y:9,ExecuteScript:function()
   {
      GameData.plotVars.GemMinesBandits1 = 1;
      _root.Interjection("Mardek","GemMinesBandits1","c_mines");
   }}]);
}
areaLoot = [{x:5,y:9,type:"item",amount:1,item:"Leather Armour"},{x:24,y:9,type:"item",amount:3,item:"Potion"},{x:35,y:7,type:"item",amount:1,item:"RingOfSTR"},{x:15,y:14,type:"item",amount:1,item:"RingOfVIT"},{x:21,y:22,type:"accs",amount:3,item:"Potion"},{x:35,y:45,type:"item",amount:1,item:"RingOfAGL"}];

{
   foes = foes.concat([["Bandit",null,null,null,"SOLO"],["Bandit","Bandit",null,null,"DUO"]]);
